text.div:
Da Vinci Organization Type Values

Da Vinci Organization type codes limited to TAX for Tax Identifier Number (TIN) and PRN for National Provider identifer (NPI).

Copyright Statement: This Content is created by the Da Vinci project and HL7. No copyright acknowledgement is needed, nor are there any license terms to adhere to

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203
    CodeDisplay
    PRNProvider number
    TAXTax ID number
